description: Number of times a player touched the ball. Note: Receiving a pass, then dribbling, then sending a pass counts as one touch
Number of times a player successfully received a pass
Number of times a player was the target of an attempted pass
Percentage of time a player successfully received a pass

Completed passes that move the ball towards the opponent's goal at least 10 yards from its furthest point in the last six passes, or any completed pass into the penalty area. Excludes passes from the defending 40% of the pitch
Percentage of time a player wins the ball when contesting in the air with a opposing player
Number of times a player wins the ball when contesting in the air with a opposing player
Number of times a player failed when attempting to gain control of a ball
Total distance, in yards, a player moved the ball towards the opponent's goal (passes & carries)
Total distance, in yards, a player moved the ball (passes & carries)
